text: Ordered Wok Fried Hor Fun With Sliced Beef In Black Bean Sauce for take out. Very friendly, but the food is too oily, probably won't go back again.
The food was really good i had fries and wings and fries were soo warm and wings were fried but not too much oil.
Cash only, but food is done fast, cheap and delicious. The staff are super friendly and nice. A great lunch takeout place!

Good price, good quality food, and outstanding service. They take credit now too! Food is made very quickly and most orders come with a drink -- great sized portion as well.  Nothing particularly unique, but they do the chinese classics well.
